content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

School debate (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What is the topic of the debate?

choices.label: Whether to change the Silver Seats system
Who should be given priority to use the Silver Seats
How to increase the availability of Silver Seats
Whether Silver Seats should be made more comfortable

content.answer: Whether to change the Silver Seats system
